Detailed Description

Stores the configuration data of the trigger.

To acces the configuration: 

   void BrTrgCondChangeListener(LCCollection *col)  {
        assert (col->getNumberOfElements()==1)
        BeTrgConf conf(col->getElementAt(0));
        UInt_t enable_mask=conf.getEnableMask();
   }
See also:
ConditionsChangeDelegator
Author:
Götz Gaycken LLR (Ecole Polytechnique)
Date:
Sep 2005

Member Function Documentation

int CALICE::BeTrgConf::getInputEnableMask (  )  const [inline]

Get the trigger enable bit mask.

For each aenabled trigger a bit is set. The meaning of the bits is defined by conditions data.

See also:
TriggerMask.
